text: Pitt Meadows is a city in Metro Vancouver that was formed as municipality in 1917. It became a city in 2007. It borders Maple Ridge to the east, Coquitlam to the west and Surrey to the south. It was named after the Pitt Lake and the Pitt River. It has a population of 19,498 as of 2024. ==Related pages== *Maple Ridge, British Columbia ==References== Category:Cities in British Columbia Category:Lower Mainland
